comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This Fokker D.VII is an Albatros license-built machine... AND STILL EXISTS TODAY. It is located in Knowlton, Quebec in a small museum there, still in it's original condition, although aging. Do a Google search and you will see it there. The fuselage fabric (anthough patched in a few places) still is in decent shape and the Militär Nummer is still recognizable on the side. Here... check out this link to compare: Good to see this aircraft is still around to examine and learn from: www.flickriver.com/photos/djipibi/sets/72157621399891612/ Enjoy!
